articles.title: Armenia In Open, India In Women's Maintain Lead; Gukesh Defeats Caruana To Score 8/8 - Chess.com
articles.description: Continuing their remarkable run in the 44th FIDE Chess Olympiad, the 12th-seeded Armenia defeated second-seeded India 2.5-1.5 and maintained their sole lead with 15 match points at the end of the eighth round. The 11th-seeded India 2 defeated the top-seeded U…
